results.title: Antiarrhythmic effects of acute betablockade with atenolol on supraventricular tachycardias at rest and during exercise.
results.text_hl: Considering only the prevention of @DISEASE_Tachycardia @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardias@@@, the antiarrhythmic potency of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ was improved in one @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with pacing induced @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Flutter</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054141 @@@flutter@@@ and impaired in one individual with a @DISEASE_Wolff_Parkinson_White_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D014927 @@@WPW syndrome@@@, by ergometric exercise.

citations.NLM: Hombach V, Braun V, Höpp HW, Gil-Sanchez D, Behrenbeck DW, Tauchert M, Hilger HH. Antiarrhythmic effects of acute betablockade with atenolol on supraventricular tachycardias at rest and during exercise. Klin Wochenschr. 1981 Feb 2;59(3):123-33. PMID: 7206601
